text: DXDM (88.7 FM), on-air as 88.7 Happy FM, is an FM station owned and operated by Notre Dame Broadcasting Corporation. Its studios and transmitter are located at the DXND Bldg., Daang Maharlika, Brgy. Poblacion, Kidapawan. ==References== ==External Links== *Happy FM Kidapawan FB Page *Brigada News FM Kidapawan Website Category:Radio stations in North Cotabato Category:Radio stations established in 1992
title: DXDM
